price: Every soul will taste death; We test you with bad and good as a trial, then to Us you will all be returned.
arabic: كُلُّ نَفۡسٖ ذَآئِقَةُ ٱلۡمَوۡتِۗ وَنَبۡلُوكُم بِٱلشَّرِّ وَٱلۡخَيۡرِ فِتۡنَةٗۖ وَإِلَيۡنَا تُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
